title: 21: No Such Thing As Testicle-Retracting Sumo Wrestlers
content: This week in the QI office, Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm), Anna (@nosuchthing) and Alex (@alexbell) discuss freedom kissing, hippo castration, iceberg cowboys and whether or not we should blow up the Moon.
contentSnippet: This week in the QI office, Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm), Anna (@nosuchthing) and Alex (@alexbell) discuss freedom kissing, hippo castration, iceberg cowboys and whether or not we should blow up the Moon.
